name: Neogen Space Monkey
description:
Neogen Space Monkey (NGSM)

 Is a classic 2D, metroidvania, that's free for everyone to enjoy. Explore the beautiful, abstract world of the artist DALEK and Generative Artworks. Collect coins, gain abilities, unlock achievements, and even more secrets in this snappy retro throwback.  Send feedback to fun@spacemonkey.games

Story

You start as an unknown Neogen Space Monkey doing what they do, causing general havoc to everything you come across in a far off corner of the multiverse. Using powerful weapons pulled from infinite portals, the destruction you unleash is unparalleled. Thanks to the Golden core of "The Golden Gravebringer", the NGSM galactic battle station, an unlimited potential can be seen. Anything on the wrong side, and sometimes even the right side is quickly turned into dust. Some say even if the Space Monkeys could lose, they would appear again at another place in time.

But for the first time ever something very wrong has happened, the Space Monkey portals are not functioning correctly, leading to a new level of chaos around the universe. Remote Space Monkeys have gone full rogue, your only choice is to destroy them and gather any other resources you can find on the boundaries of space and time itself. Will you be able to find a way back to The Golden Gravebringer and seek out The Golden Leader?

Controls

Navigate the Neogen Space Monkey world by using your keyboard or plugging up a compatible USB game controller. (If you have a controller and it doesn’t work with the game, please reach out and let us know so we can support it.)

Keyboard Controls:
D or ➡️: move your Space monkey to the Right
A or ⬅️: move your Space Monkey to the Left
Spacebar: Jump
Spacebar x2: Double Jump
Shift: Air Dash
Enter or Left mouse click: Shoot
Hold Enter or Left Mouse hold: Charge shot; release button to shoot
Tab: Pause/Main menu
Esc: Exit fullscreen

Controller Controls:
Start: Pause/ Main Menu
Joystick or D-pad: Move your Space Monkey to the left or right
A: Jump
A x2: Double Jump
X: Shoot
Hold X: Charge shot; Release to shoot
B: Air Dash
